variables.CONTENT:ALPINE_HEADER: Run ${{ APP:NAME }} based on Alpine Linux. Small, lightweight, secure and fast üèîÔ∏è
variables.CONTENT:TIPS:
## Tips
* Only use rootless container runtime (podman, rootless docker)
* Don't bind to ports < 1024 (requires root), use NAT/reverse proxy (haproxy, traefik, nginx)
variables.CONTENT:DEFAULTS:
| Parameter | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | docker | user docker |
| `uid` | 1000 | user id 1000 |
| `gid` | 1000 | group id 1000 |
| `home` | ${{ APP:ROOT }} | home directory of user docker |
variables.CONTENT:ENVIRONMENT:
## Environment
| Parameter | Value | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `TZ` | [Time Zone](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones) | null |
| `DEBUG` | Show debug information | null |
